typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Tipo1 as string,
		Tipo2 as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Drv_Act as string,
		COD_UEN as string,
		UEN as string,
		SAG as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Material as string,
		Des_Mat as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Sector as string,
		Innovacion as string,
		Clasificacion as string,
		Beerhouse as string,
		SubCupo as string,
		Onzas as string,
		PackPresentacion as string,
		Familia as string,
		High_End as string,
		Origen as string,
		Abr_19 as string,
		May_19 as string,
		Ene_20 as string,
		Feb_20 as string,
		Mar_20 as string,
		Abr_20 as string,
		May_20 as string,
		Jun_20 as string,
		Jul_20 as string,
		Ago_20 as string,
		Sep_20 as string,
		Oct_20 as string,
		Nov_20 as string,
		Dic_20 as string,
		Ene_21 as string,
		Feb_21 as string,
		Mar_21 as string,
		Abr_21 as string,
		May_21 as string,
		Jun_21 as string,
		Jul_21 as string,
		Ago_21 as string,
		Sep_21 as string,
		Oct_21 as string,
		Nov_21 as string,
		Dic_21 as string,
		AcumDia_19 as string,
		AcumDia_21 as string,
		MTD_19 as string,
		Tend as string,
		YTD_19 as string,
		YTD_21 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseSales
source(output(
		Material as string,
		Texto_breve_de_material as string,
		Mercado as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Envase as string,
		Factor as string,
		Cupo1 as string,
		Cupo2 as string,
		Ce as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		Subagencia as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Ce2 as string,
		Ce3 as string,
		Zona2 as string,
		Agencia2 as string,
		Subagencia2 as string,
		Id as string,
		Tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseCatalog
SourceSynapseCatalog select(mapColumn(
		SAG_CAT = Subagencia,
		COD_SAG_CAT = COD_SAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG
SourceSynapseSales, SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG lookup(trim(upper(SAG)) == trim(upper(SAG_CAT)),
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSAGtoSubagencia
LookupSAGtoSubagencia select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sort(asc(COD_SAG_CAT, true),
	asc(SAG, true),
	asc(Material, true),
	asc(Des_Mat, true)) ~> SortRows
SortRows sink(input(
		Tipo1 as string,
		Tipo2 as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Drv_Act as string,
		COD_UEN as string,
		UEN as string,
		SAG as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Material as string,
		Des_Mat as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Sector as string,
		Innovacion as string,
		Clasificacion as string,
		Beerhouse as string,
		SubCupo as string,
		Onzas as string,
		PackPresentacion as string,
		Familia as string,
		High_End as string,
		Origen as string,
		Abr_19 as string,
		May_19 as string,
		Ene_20 as string,
		Feb_20 as string,
		Mar_20 as string,
		Abr_20 as string,
		May_20 as string,
		Jun_20 as string,
		Jul_20 as string,
		Ago_20 as string,
		Sep_20 as string,
		Oct_20 as string,
		Nov_20 as string,
		Dic_20 as string,
		Ene_21 as string,
		Feb_21 as string,
		Mar_21 as string,
		Abr_21 as string,
		May_21 as string,
		Jun_21 as string,
		Jul_21 as string,
		Ago_21 as string,
		Sep_21 as string,
		Oct_21 as string,
		Nov_21 as string,
		Dic_21 as string,
		AcumDia_19 as string,
		AcumDia_21 as string,
		MTD_19 as string,
		Tend as string,
		YTD_19 as string,
		YTD_21 as string,
		SAG_CAT as string,
		COD_SAG_CAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseConsolidation
